prpty1.prptyDesc: The highest level of security, based on international and UAE government standards
No more physical cash collection, saving time and money on administration costs and collecting charges
Low charges for using the e-dirham platform compared to other platforms
Allow your customers to pay online

prpty2.prptyDesc: Allow your customers to pay via their mobile device
Allow your customers to pay via e-dirham cards
Clear and real time overview of all your collections and payment via e-dirham
E-Dirham is expanding and growing their network even further every day. Adding new services and functionalities to the e-dirham platform

bfrmwrkp: E-Dirham makes use of highly secure framework called MPLS within the private cloud solutions specifically designed for the UAE government. This frameworks allows full transactions to be done under 1.4 seconds with real time reporting and abiding to all international security standards. Online and mobile solutions as well as the POS system are making use of this framework.
bhowp: An extensive business analysis will take place to see where e-dirham ease and optimize the business workflows

bhowlist1.bhowlistp: A team of experts from both from the Ministry of Finance and National Bank of Abu Dhabi are involved to support the integration
Thorough testing and analysis take place prior to the launch ensuring that everything is working accordingly to the highest standards
Certificates will be issued when tests have been successful, making you compliant with national and international security standards

bhowlist2.bhowlistp: A dedicated team from e-dirham will help to train your staff on how to use the platform for your organization along with all necessary documentation

An after a successful test, with a real customer completing the full payment cycle monitored by the ministry. An official statement and signing                ceremony will take place to congratulate you with having e-dirham.
